Localization.Name: Roberts Space Industries
Localization.Description: The original creators of the engine that kickstarted Humanity’s expansion into space, Roberts Space Industries builds a wide range of spaceships that serve all needs, from basic interstellar travel to deep exploration on the outer edges of the galaxy. The tagline is “Roberts Space Industries: Delivering the Stars since 2075”

English.Description: The original creators of the engine that kickstarted Humanity’s expansion into space, Roberts Space Industries builds a wide range of spaceships that serve all needs, from basic interstellar travel to deep exploration on the outer edges of the galaxy. Localization.Name: RSI Polaris Torpedo Rack
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Torpedo Rack
Manufacturer: RSI
Size: 10
Torpedo: 7xS10 

Bring the impressive firepower of the Polaris to bear with this bespoke torpedo rack holding seven massive S10 torpedoes.
